title: William and Kate share Valentine's portrait as Meghan offers rare glimpse of Harry with Lilibet

title: Bogus cop, State security agent arrested for drug trafficking
desc: A 35-year-old man wearing full police uniform was arrested for drug peddling and trafficking alongside his accomplice, a State security agent. desc: Why Atomera’s latest earnings are drawing fresh attention Atomera (ATOM) is back on investors’ radar after its fourth quarter and full year 2025 earnings report, which detailed low sales levels alongside continued net losses and modestly narrower per share losses. title: Ukraine сonfirms strike on oil terminal in Russia's Krasnodar Krai, hits air defense system in Crimea
desc: Ukraine carried out strikes on an oil terminal in southern Russia and a Russian air defense system in Crimea overnight on Feb. 14–15, according to Ukraine's military intelligence (HUR).

title: Chamisa evokes Tsvangirai's bruised legacy as battle over constitutional changes heats up
desc: OPPOSITION politician Nelson Chamisa has paid tribute to his late political mentor Morgan Tsvangirai, recalling what he described as scars of persecution, betrayal and “constitutional mutilation.” The 48-year-old former Citizens Coalition for Change (CCC) leader says the proposed alterations to the supreme law threaten to tip Zimbabwe into full-blown dictatorship, the very scourge Tsvangirai battled […]
